publ: by 株式会社塚本無線
name: WTWEAGLE
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
[WTW EAGLE] skill for Amazon Alexa is designed to securely monitor your home or business premises remotely. With [WTW EAGLE] skill for Amazon Alexa integration, you can now interact with your Trueview cameras*(4G & Wi-Fi) by voice.

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your WTW EAGLE account and discover your WTW EAGLE cameres. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at “Connect Smart Home Device to Alexa”. http://amzn.to/291lR7u .

When using the Skill, you need to create names for your devices. 

Once you know the name for your devices, you can give commands such as:

"Alexa, show the camera name"
"Alexa, stop the camera name"
